Plot: With their daughter away, the Kranks decide to skip Christmas altogether until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate the holiday at the last minute.
Title: Christmas with the Kranks
Actors: Tim Allen, Jamie Lee Curtis, Dan Aykroyd, M. Emmet Walsh
tomatoConsensus: A mirthless movie as fresh as last year's fruit cake, Christmas with the Kranks is a coarse, garish comedy that promotes conformity.
